title: my video card isnt compatible with league all of a sudden? really tilted
body:
just played a match about an hour ago, and i finished one just now where they had a remake and i demoted down a division because of it.

what the hell?

league worked perfectly just an hour ago, and suddenly it's not compatible with my computer anymore?

The window said something about directX and league not being compatible my video card.

just posting this here before i search up why this is happening, thanks for replies in advance

replies.body: This is a really strange error, and getting a demotion as a result is pretty shitty.  What video card are you using, and has it been recently updated?  Is this happening specifically when loading into the game, or sometime while playing?

i have an intel(r) hd 520 graphics card, and it was always up to date

this is the first time this has happened and has occured after champ select during when the loading screen was supposed to come up
